jump_scares.spoiler: A person lands on the roof of a car behind two Vietnamese workers
Andy rolls over in bed and sees Chucky right in front of him
Shane closes the fridge door and is startled by Chucky who makes a scary face
There is a slight scare during the movie the kids are watching as a man bursts into a room holding a chainsaw
Shane turns around and sees Chucky standing on the bench
During a tense and quiet scene where Andy is walking towards Chucky, Karen suddenly walks past (the loud sound effect is very startling)
Shane is startled by Chucky while urinating
A shadow moves past in the foreground
After seeing Shane’s skinned face, Andy is startled by Chucky who says “surprise”
There is a loud crash as Gabe watches Karen on the security camera
Gabe is suddenly cut on the leg
Chucky suddenly attacks Doreen after saying “Peka-BOO!”
As Andy looks closely at the toy bear, he is suddenly grabbed on the shoulder (a few seconds later there is another slight scare as a balloon pops)
As Andy looks for Chucky, a shadow moves past in the foreground
After Chucky says “when they’re all gone”, Andy is knocked out from behind
After the Buddi song starts playing again, Andy turns around and Chucky suddenly lunges at him
